Package index

Create dataset

High-level functions to create datasets

create_dataset() create_dataset_abcd() create_dataset_hbcd()
Create a dataset

Read and join data

Read and join data released in the NBDC Data Hub.

join_tabulated() join_tabulated_abcd() join_tabulated_hbcd()
Join tabulated data
read_dsv_formatted()
Read delimiter (tab/comma) separated values file correctly formatted

Transform data

Transform/format data released in the NBDC Data Hub.

transf_factor()
Convert categorical columns to factor
transf_label()
Add variable/value labels
transf_time_to_hms()
Convert time columns to hms format
transf_value_to_label()
Convert values to labels for categorical variables
transf_value_to_na()
Convert categorical missingness/non-response codes to NA

Filter data

Filter/subset data released in the NBDC Data Hub.

filter_empty_cols()
Filter empty columns
filter_empty_rows()
Filter empty rows
filter_events_abcd()
Filter ABCD events
filter_id_events()
Filter ID/events

Shadow matrices

Work with shadow matrices for data in the NBDC Data Hub.

shadow_bind_data()
Bind the shadow matrix to the data
shadow_replace_binding_missing()
Fix binding resulted missingness in shadow matrices

Metadata

Retrieve metadata (data dictionary, levels table, sessions table, identifier columns) for studies released in the NBDC Data Hub.

get_metadata()
Get metadata
get_dd() get_dd_abcd() get_dd_hbcd()
Get data dictionary
get_levels() get_levels_abcd() get_levels_hbcd()
Get levels table
get_sessions() get_sessions_abcd() get_sessions_hbcd()
Get sessions table
get_id_cols() get_id_cols_abcd() get_id_cols_hbcd()
Get identifier columns

Utility functions

Utility functions for working with data in the NBDC Data Hub.

create_bids_sidecar()
Create BIDS sidecar
convert_names_data()
Convert column names in a data frame
convert_names_file()
Convert column names in a file
